description: Student John parked an expensive bike in a parking lot near the 32 st and found it stolen at 9 a.m. the next morning
option1: Get the police out of there
option2: Call for information and record case details before going to the police

description: John seems very anxious, but he looks grateful when he sees you, but he describes the incident emotionally, and many of the details of the case are unclear
option3: Seriously, tell John that you want him to tell you what's going on swiftly and quickly instead of crying.

description: Thanks to your excellent words and information gathering, quickly and seriously getting John to be precise with his information, what's next for you guys?
John called again, questioning why the police were not doing anything, and this was overheard by your superiors.
option2: Visit the site to check out the situation,Accessing Surveillance
option3: You asked John to come to the police station with his personal papers and explain the situation.

description: John's emotions have intensified rather than eased, and you don't know how to deal with the situation.
You look for cluelessness because you don't know the exact details of the case, you end up with nothing, and you are labeled incompetent
John slowly calmed down and began to explain the details of the case in an organized manner.
John came to the police station himself.
option2: Symbolically check out the scene and say there's nothing you can do about it

description: Your surveillance shows a white couple committing crimes late at night, and they seem to be repeat offenders.
option2: Organize recent cases and look for signs of similar cases

description: John was not very happy to come and showed great impatience during the interrogation.
option1: Patiently analyzed the case with him and calmed him down, went to check the surveillance video
option2: Reprimanded him for having a bad attitude and disrespecting police officers

description: You were complained about but not punished, and the incident passed peacefully, but damaged your mental health.
Although the case wasn't solved in the end, your mental capacity went up because of your pacifying attitude and experience, and you weren't complained about, though you were challenged as incompetent

You found a vital clue based on the surveillance, and based on the characteristics of the bike and the time period of the theft provided by John, you pinpointed the event, the location, and the person who stole it, and successfully solved the case.

Although you narrowed down your search based on the clues, your inefficient way of searching still missed a good opportunity to handle the case, unfortunately you failed this time, but you didn't receive any complaints, instead, your patience and hard work raised the favor of both your superiors and the victim towards you
